{{cpp/numeric/valarray/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|
valarray&lt;T&gt; operator+() const;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|1=
valarray&lt;T&gt; operator-() const;
}}
{{dcl|num=3|1=
valarray&lt;T&gt; operator~() const;
}}
{{dcl|num=4|1=
valarray&lt;bool&gt; operator!() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Applies unary operators to each element in the numeric array.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A numeric array containing elements with values obtained by applying corresponding operator to the values in {{c|*this}}.

{{cpp/impldef exception}}

===Notes===
Each of the operators can only be instantiated if the following requirements are met:
:* The indicated operator can be applied to type {{tt|T}}.
:* The result value can be unambiguously converted to {{tt|T}} (1-3) or {{c|bool}} (4).

{{cpp/numeric/valarray/notes_ret}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;string_view&gt;
#include &lt;valarray&gt;

template&lt;typename T&gt;
void print(std::string_view const note,
           std::valarray&lt;T&gt; const vala, // by-value, see Notes above
           std::string_view const term = "\n")
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; note &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha &lt;&lt; std::showpos;
    for (T const element : vala)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; '\t' &lt;&lt; element;
    std::cout &lt;&lt; term;
}

int main()
{
    std::valarray&lt;int&gt; x{1, 2, 3, 4};
    print&lt;int&gt;("x: ", x);
    print&lt;int&gt;("+x: ", +x);
    print&lt;int&gt;("+ + x: ", + + x);
    print&lt;int&gt;("-x: ", -x);
    print&lt;int&gt;("- - x: ", - - x, "\n\n");

    std::valarray&lt;short&gt; y{0, 1, -1, 0x7fff};
    print&lt;short&gt;("y: ", y);
    print&lt;short&gt;("~y: ", ~y);
    print&lt;short&gt;("~~y: ", ~~y, "\n\n");

    std::valarray&lt;bool&gt; z{true, false};
    print&lt;bool&gt;("z: ", z);
    print&lt;bool&gt;("!z: ", !z);
    print&lt;bool&gt;("!!z: ", !!z);
}
|p=true&lt;!-- when 0B10 != sizeof(short) :--&gt;
|output=
x:      +1      +2      +3      +4
+x:     +1      +2      +3      +4
+ + x:  +1      +2      +3      +4
-x:     -1      -2      -3      -4
- - x:  +1      +2      +3      +4

y:      +0      +1      -1      +32767
~y:     -1      -2      +0      -32768
~~y:    +0      +1      -1      +32767
                     
z:      true    false
!z:     false   true
!!z:    true    false
}}
